About

About

Driven and versatile software engineer with a proven track record of delivering innovative solutions across diverse domains. My expertise spans full-stack development, UI/UX design, and project leadership in both commercial and government sectors.

I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the University of Virginia, my skill set encompasses a breadth of programming languages, software development methodologies, and a dedication to advancing technology for mission-critical objectives.

Outside of engineering and work, I enjoy spending time outdoors through running, soccer, and snowboarding.
